channel.title: Two Simple Client Questions
channel.description:
Hi, I am using Summon Pkz v7 and I have 2 questions.
1. How do I edit the item list? (change item codes etc.)
2. How do I add music to the client?

item.title: Two Simple Client Questions
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

[quote=“xray veeo, post:4, topic:246977”][quote author=xjadefighter link=topic=325931.msg2554591#msg2554591 date=1227821526]

2:obviously done in item.cfg and class8[/quote]

ya go in ur class8.java and look up the item and jst change the number above all the ints then go in ur server files and in item.java and look up the old item id and chnage it to the new 1

hope this helps

He doesn’t need your confirmation.[/quote]

lol ok calm down

Read full topic
